title: Disposition of records during and after
context: ยง431:15-338 Disposition of records during and after termination of liquidation. Whenever it shall appear to the commissioner that the records of any insurer in process of liquidation or completely liquidated are no longer useful, the commissioner may recommend to the court and the court shall direct what records should be retained for future reference and what should be destroyed. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2]
